app_description: Are you searching for an accurate translations app that you can rely on to provide support in over 100 languages and will show you the proper pronunciation too How about being able to order professional human powered translations for all of your documents and be able to translate very large bodies of text within the same app Well then this is the app for you! Day Translations Translator app connects you with the world. HIGHLY ACCURATE INSTANT TEXT TRANSLATION Day Translations is a world class translations company so we understand languages. Our premium translator will help you translate phrases fast and accurately NEW INTERPRETING FEATURE: SPEECH TO SPEECH TRANSLATIONS Speak into the microphone and get an instant interpretation of what you re saying in almost any language! This feature is especially helpful when you re meeting with someone that speaks a different language than yourself. Understand exactly what they re saying in an instant and practice proper pronunciation of that language yourself. NEW PRO FEATURE: HUMAN POWERED TRANSLATIONS If you need professional Human Powered Translations for documents or other files you can order the translations directly from the app using the Pro feature. Our app lets you sign up or login within seconds through our Pro button so that you may order you re a professional human powered translation in a wide variety of file formats. You can even get an instant FREE quote on human translation orders for your documents. NEW PAID SUBSCRIPTION FEATURE: MACHINE POWERED TRANSLATIONS If you need large bodies of text translated accurately within a moments notice you can subscribe to one of our paid models that best suits your needs. Our app lets you translate up to 450 thousand characters per day for only 22 dollars per month. SUPPORT AND TRANSLATION IN OVER 100 LANGUAGES The translation app provides translations in languages such as: Afrikaans Albanian Amharic Arabic Armenian Azerbaijani Basque Belorussian Bengali Bosnian Bulgarian Catalan Cebuano Chichewa Chinese Simplified Chinese Traditional Corsican Croatian Czech Danish Dutch English Esperanto Estonian Filipino Finnish French Frisian Galician Georgian German Greek Gujarati Haitian Creole Hausa Hawaiian Hebrew Hindi and many more. USER FRIENDLY UI Our Free Translator App is incredibly easy to use so you can share it with anyone without having to explain much. Note: This app requires an internet connection. For document translations visit our website www.daytranslations.com or sign up on the app. Permissions Notice The Day Translations Language Translator app will ask for permission to access the following features on your phone: Location Storage Internet Phone Call Microphone Camera Support Visit https: www.daytranslations.com contact us or send an email to contact daytranslations.com Follow us on Twitter: https: twitter.com DayTranslations Like share on Facebook: https: www.facebook.com DayTranslations Learn more about us: https: www.daytranslations.com
